board.name: CYW920829-KEYBOARD
board.summary: The AIROC™ CYW20829 keyboard reference solution is an ultra-low power keyboard design with multi-device support that demonstrates Bluetooth® LE HID over GATT profile It comes with the right combination of low power and high performance dual core Arm® Cortex® M33 to meet the demands of battery powered keyboard.
board.prov_capabilities: ble bsp_gen4 bt cat1 cat1b cyw20829 cyw920829_keyboard flash_0k hal i2s led low_power mcu_gp memory memory_qspi mxsv2 nor_flash pdm qspi rtc sdhc smart_io sram_64k std_crypto switch
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 32-bit CPU subsystem with Arm® Cortex® M33
  • 128-KB SRAM with power and data retention control
  • Low power 2.1 - 3.0 V operation
  • Bluetooth® LE subsystem with 2.4GHz RF transceiver, Digital PHY and Programmable TX power
  • Battery voltage measurement with 16 bit ADC
  • 5-pin SWD connectors
  • Built-in Keyscan matrix pre-configured for 79 keys layout

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920829-KEYBOARD Reference kit
  • Kit Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920829-MOUSE
board.summary: The AIROC™ CYW20829 mouse reference solution is an ultra-low power mouse design with multi-device support that demonstrates Bluetooth® LE HID over GATT profile It comes with the right combination of low power and high performance dual core Arm® Cortex® M33 to meet the demands of battery powered mouse.
board.prov_capabilities: ble bsp_gen4 bt cat1 cat1b cyw20829 cyw920829_mouse flash_0k hal i2s led low_power mcu_gp memory memory_qspi mxsv2 nor_flash pdm qspi rtc sdhc smart_io sram_64k std_crypto switch
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 32-bit CPU subsystem with Arm® Cortex® M33
  • 128-KB SRAM with power and data retention control
  • Low power 2.1 - 3.0 V operation
  • Bluetooth® LE subsystem with 2.4GHz RF transceiver, Digital PHY and Programmable TX power
  • Battery voltage measurement with 16 bit ADC
  • 5-pin SWD connectors
  • Left, Right, Middle and DPI buttons
  • SPI based optical motion sensor
  • F-switch Quadrature Encoder for scroll wheel

Kit Contents:
  • CYW20829-MOUSE reference kit
  • Kit Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920829-VR
board.summary: The AIROC™ CYW20829 Bluetooth® LE SoC is a Bluetooth® 5.4 core spec-compliant for IoT, HID, smart home and industrial applications. It comes with the right combination of low power and high performance dual core Arm® Cortex® M33 to meet the high demands of Bluetooth® LE Applications.
board.prov_capabilities: ble bt cat1 cat1b cyw20829 cyw920829_vr flash_0k hal i2s led low_power mcu_gp memory memory_qspi mxsv2 nor_flash pdm qspi rtc sdhc smart_io sram_64k std_crypto switch
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 32-bit CPU subsystem with Arm® Cortex® M33
  • 256-KB SRAM with power and data retention control
  • Low power 1.7 - 3.6 V operation
  • Bluetooth® LE subsystem with 2.4GHz RF transceiver, Digital PHY and Programmable TX power
  • ADCMic with Audio and DC measurement capability
  • Connectors for battery
  • 10-pin SWD connectors
  • Up to 26 programmable GPIOs

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920829-VR Reference Remote board
  • USB-UART cable
  • MiniProg-4
  • Kit User Guide

board.name: CYW920829M2EVK-02
board.summary: The Infineon AIROC™ CYW20829 Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW92089M2EVK-02) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW20829, a low power and high performance Bluetooth® LE MCU. <p/> The AIROC™ CYW20829 Bluetooth® LE MCU provides reliable Bluetooth® connectivity, core spec compliant to 5.4. It is a highly integrated device with an ARM® Cortex® M33 that is dedicated for customer applications, and an integrated power amplifier with 10 dBm of transmit output power. The AIROC™ CYW20829 is ideal for a wide range of applications in home and industrial automation, sensors, lighting, Bluetooth® mesh, remote controls and any other Bluetooth® LE connected IoT application. <p/> The AIROC™ CYW20829 Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW920829M2EVK-02) and ModusToolbox™ software and tools form a powerful but easy to use toolset that helps developers create amazing Bluetooth® enabled IoT solutions.
board.prov_capabilities: ble bsp_gen4 bt cat1 cat1b cyw20829 cyw920829m2evk_02 flash_0k hal i2s led low_power mcu_gp memory memory_qspi mesh mxsv2 nor_flash pdm qspi rtc sdhc smart_io sram_64k std_crypto switch
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • AIROC™ CYW20829 Bluetooth® LE MCU in 56 pin QFN package
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - 6-axis IMU, thermistor, Infineon analog microphone, and Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches, RGB LED and user LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW20829 evaluation board (CYW9BTM2BASE3+CYW920829M2IPA2)
  • USB Type-A to Micro-B cable
  • Six jumper wires (five inches each)
  • Quick start guide
